languages.text: "Если же мои жертвы начнут заканчиваться... думаю, твои слуги будут слишком бояться стать моей следующей игрушкой, чтобы удовлетворительно исполнять свой долг". {n}Маражай кривится.{/n} "Тот упитанный мон-кай на мостике корабля... фактотум? Думаю, он решит проблему поступления мяса, если таковая возникнет".

"If I begin to run out of sacrifices... I think your servants will be too terrified of becoming my next plaything to perform their duties adequately." {n}Marazhai smirks.{/n} "That well-fed mon-keigh on the ship's bridge... the Factotum? I think he will solve the meat supply problem, if it arises."
languages.original_text: "Если же мои жертвы начнут заканчиваться... думаю, твои слуги будут слишком бояться стать моей следующей игрушкой, чтобы удовлетворительно исполнять свой долг". {n}Маражай кривится.{/n} "Тот упитанный мон-кай на мостике корабля... фактотум? Думаю, он решит проблему поступления мяса, если таковая возникнет".

I think he will solve the meat supply problem, if it arises."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

I think your servants will be too terrified of becoming my next plaything to perform their duties adequately." {n}Marazhai smirks.{/n} "That well-fed mon-keigh on the ship's bridge... the Factotum? languages.text: « Si je commence à manquer de sacrifices... vos serviteurs risquent de ne plus pouvoir travailler correctement, tant ils seront terrifiés à l'idée qu'ils pourraient être les prochains à me servir de jouets, {n}explique Marazhai avec un sourire narquois.{/n} Ce mon-keigh replet sur la passerelle du vaisseau... Le factotum, il me semble ? Il devrait faire une bonne source de chair, en cas de besoin. »
languages.original_text: "If I begin to run out of sacrifices... I think your servants will be too terrified of becoming my next plaything to perform their duties adequately." {n}Marazhai smirks.{/n} "That well-fed mon-keigh on the ship's bridge... the Factotum? I think he will solve the meat supply problem, if it arises."

traits.locale_text: « Si je commence à manquer de sacrifices... vos serviteurs risquent de ne plus pouvoir travailler correctement, tant ils seront terrifiés à l'idée qu'ils pourraient être les prochains à me servir de jouets, {n}explique Marazhai avec un sourire narquois.{/n} Ce mon-keigh replet sur la passerelle du vaisseau... Le factotum, il me semble ? Il devrait faire une bonne source de chair, en cas de besoin. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: «Si empiezo a quedarme sin sacrificios... supongo que tus sirvientes estarán demasiado aterrados por la idea de ser mis siguientes juguetes como para desempeñar sus funciones de forma adecuada». {n}Marazhai sonríe, arrogante.{/n} «Ese mon-keigh tan cebado del puente... el Factótum, creo. Servirá para remediar la escasez de carne si se produce».
languages.original_text: "If I begin to run out of sacrifices... I think your servants will be too terrified of becoming my next plaything to perform their duties adequately." {n}Marazhai smirks.{/n} "That well-fed mon-keigh on the ship's bridge... the Factotum? I think he will solve the meat supply problem, if it arises."

traits.locale_text: «Si empiezo a quedarme sin sacrificios... supongo que tus sirvientes estarán demasiado aterrados por la idea de ser mis siguientes juguetes como para desempeñar sus funciones de forma adecuada». {n}Marazhai sonríe, arrogante.{/n} «Ese mon-keigh tan cebado del puente... el Factótum, creo. Servirá para remediar la escasez de carne si se produce».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: 「生贄の残りが少なくなってきたら…お前の使用人たちは、次のおもちゃにされることを恐れて、任務を無事に遂行できなくなるだろうな」{n}マラズハイがニヤリと笑う。{/n}「ブリッジにいる、あのよく肥えたモン＝ケイ…最悪の場合、あの便利屋が肉の食糧問題を解決してくれるだろう」
languages.original_text: "If I begin to run out of sacrifices... I think your servants will be too terrified of becoming my next plaything to perform their duties adequately." {n}Marazhai smirks.{/n} "That well-fed mon-keigh on the ship's bridge... the Factotum? I think he will solve the meat supply problem, if it arises."

traits.locale_text: 「生贄の残りが少なくなってきたら…お前の使用人たちは、次のおもちゃにされることを恐れて、任務を無事に遂行できなくなるだろうな」{n}マラズハイがニヤリと笑う。{/n}「ブリッジにいる、あのよく肥えたモン＝ケイ…最悪の場合、あの便利屋が肉の食糧問題を解決してくれるだろう」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: “如果我的祭品耗尽的话……恐怕你的仆人就会担心沦为我新的玩物，无法专心履行职责了。”{n}玛拉斋得意洋洋地笑了起来。{/n}“比如说，舰桥上那个脑满肠肥的猴子……是叫高阶顾问吧？如果活畜供应出了问题的话，他应该可以解决问题。”
languages.original_text: "If I begin to run out of sacrifices... I think your servants will be too terrified of becoming my next plaything to perform their duties adequately." {n}Marazhai smirks.{/n} "That well-fed mon-keigh on the ship's bridge... the Factotum? I think he will solve the meat supply problem, if it arises."

traits.locale_text: “如果我的祭品耗尽的话……恐怕你的仆人就会担心沦为我新的玩物，无法专心履行职责了。”{n}玛拉斋得意洋洋地笑了起来。{/n}“比如说，舰桥上那个脑满肠肥的猴子……是叫高阶顾问吧？如果活畜供应出了问题的话，他应该可以解决问题。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: "Wenn mir die Opfer ausgehen ... Ich glaube, Eure Diener hätten zu große Angst, mein nächstes Spielzeug zu werden, um ihre Pflichten noch adäquat zu erfüllen." {n}Marazhai grinst.{/n} "Der wohlgenährte Chem-Pan-Sey auf der Brücke des Schiffs ... das Faktotum? Ich denke, er wird das Fleischproblem lösen, wenn es sich auftut."
languages.original_text: "If I begin to run out of sacrifices... I think your servants will be too terrified of becoming my next plaything to perform their duties adequately." {n}Marazhai smirks.{/n} "That well-fed mon-keigh on the ship's bridge... the Factotum? I think he will solve the meat supply problem, if it arises."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn mir die Opfer ausgehen ... Ich glaube, Eure Diener hätten zu große Angst, mein nächstes Spielzeug zu werden, um ihre Pflichten noch adäquat zu erfüllen." {n}Marazhai grinst.{/n} "Der wohlgenährte Chem-Pan-Sey auf der Brücke des Schiffs ... das Faktotum? Ich denke, er wird das Fleischproblem lösen, wenn es sich auftut."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: "Kurbanlarım tükenecek olursa... Hizmetkârların, sıradaki oyuncağım olma ihtimalinden ötürü dehşete düşüp görevlerini düzgünce yerine getiremeyebilir." {n}Marazhai sırıtıyor.{/n} "Geminin köprüsündeki şu semirgin mon-keigh... Kâhya mıydı? Olası bir et tedariki sorununu çözecektir sanıyorum."
languages.original_text: "If I begin to run out of sacrifices... I think your servants will be too terrified of becoming my next plaything to perform their duties adequately." {n}Marazhai smirks.{/n} "That well-fed mon-keigh on the ship's bridge... the Factotum? I think he will solve the meat supply problem, if it arises."

traits.locale_text: "Kurbanlarım tükenmeye başlarsa, hizmetkârların, bir sonraki oyuncağım olabilecekleri ihtimalinden dolayı dehşete düşüp, görevlerini doğru şekilde yerine getiremez hâle gelebilirler." {n}Marazhai sırıtıyor.{/n} "Geminin köprüsündeki şu semirmiş mon-keigh. Kâhya mıydı? Ortaya çıkabilecek et tedariki sorununu o hâlleder sanıyorum."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
